Text:
Still the totally expurgated version, missing 15 minutes, mostly of superb half or full nude sessions from Miss Bellucci. 
I'm working on a rehabilitation of this UNCUT version, expect it within next week...

@kepler42 - yes I know - you guys are writing this under every release of this movie lol
I didn't see the longer version, and from what you are saying I would love to ;) but for now there simply isn't any other HD release. So I'm assuming you want to mix-in upscaled DVD quality scenes or something?

Lets wait and see..I'm vacationing until April 20th.
PS/ even in SD Miss Bellucci has a lot of "relief" and is worth "upscaling"
